Description:

Trials Evolution: Gold Edition marks the triumphant return 
of the franchise Trials platform PC.
Series Games Trials, famous franchise company RedLynx, first 
gained attention in 2008 after the release of Trials 2 SE for PC. 
Instant success on an independent platform led to further popularity 
in the Xbox, but the players on the PC since 
it is strongly demanded continuation Trials.
Trials Evolution: Gold Edition - the answer to their expectations.

Description:

Immerse yourself in an endless stream of racing events in the incredible 
world Trials Fusion. Show all that capable, overcoming obstacles and soaring 
skyward on trampolines in an attempt to break the record of the best racers 
in the world. No matter whether you pass the track alone, are competing with 
friends or participate in global competition - in the world around you there 
is always a sense of competition. In this race to the official routes - this is 
only the beginning. Those who intend to conquer more and more insane tracks, waiting 
for the rich world of custom tracks created by the most creative and skillful writers. 
Long-term support of the game and the regular addition of her new features and content 
will further expand the universe Trials and tirelessly to please the players new unusual tests.
